adText: Book your ticket now and travel safely!

bookOnline.title: Book Your Bus Ticket Online
bookOnline.description: Reserve your bus tickets quickly and securely from anywhere in Rwanda, without waiting in line.

trackBus.title: Track Your Bus in Real Time
trackBus.description: Know exactly where your bus is before it arrives at your stop for a stress-free journey.

easyUse.title: Easy to Use on All Platforms
easyUse.description: Our app and website are designed for everyone, whether on desktop, tablet, or mobile.

footer.tagline: Experience safe and comfortable travel across Rwanda. We connect you to every destination with reliability and care.
footer.bookDescription: Reserve your seat for a comfortable journey across Rwanda.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get special offers and travel updates.

services.sectionDescription: Book tickets, track your vehicle, or plan your trip easily online, offline, or via USSD.
services.bookTicketDesc: Plan your journey starting with a fast ticket that fits your schedule.
services.trackCarDesc: See your vehicle’s real-time location and estimated arrival at your destination.
services.onlineOfflineBookingDesc: Book tickets via our app or at authorized ticket points.
services.ussdBookingDesc: Book quickly using a USSD code directly from your phone.
services.bottomDescription: We provide easy ways to plan your journey, select your vehicle, and purchase tickets instantly.

about.title: Rwanda's Most Trusted Bus Service
about.subtitle: Connecting cities across Rwanda with safe, comfortable, and reliable transportation. Experience the difference of modern bus travel with Aby Ticket.
about.description: Since our establishment, Aby Ticket has been committed to providing exceptional bus services throughout Rwanda. We operate modern, well-maintained buses with professional drivers who prioritize your safety and comfort. Our extensive network connects major cities including Kigali, Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, and more.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: All our buses undergo regular maintenance checks and safety inspections. Our experienced drivers are trained in defensive driving and passenger safety protocols.

punctuality.title: On-Time Departures
punctuality.description: We value your time. Our buses depart on schedule, ensuring you reach your destination when you need to. Real-time tracking keeps you informed throughout your journey.

comfort.title: Comfortable Travel
comfort.description: Enjoy spacious seating, air conditioning, clean restrooms, and onboard entertainment. Our buses are designed for your comfort on both short and long journeys.

locations.subtitle: Travel Across Rwanda
locations.title: We Connect Every Corner
locations.description: Book safe, comfortable, and affordable bus tickets to all major destinations in Rwanda.
locations.ctaDesc: Over 50+ daily departures to Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, and beyond.

hero.title: Travel Rwanda with Ease & Comfort
hero.subtitle: Book tickets from trusted operators to any destination — safe, fast, and reliable.

bookingProcess.title: Simple steps to book your bus ticket
bookingProcess.subtitle: Book your bus ticket in three easy ways - through our website, mobile app, or using USSD code. Fast, secure, and convenient booking at your fingertips.

choose.title: Choose Your Journey
choose.content: Select your departure and destination cities, pick your preferred travel date and time. Browse available routes from Kigali to Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, and more. Compare prices and bus operators to find the perfect option.

book.title: Book Your Ticket
book.content: Complete your booking through our website, mobile app, or dial *334# for USSD. Choose your seat, add passenger details, and pay securely via Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), card, or cash at our offices.

travel.title: Travel With Ease
travel.content: Receive your e-ticket via SMS and email instantly. Show your ticket code at the bus station, board your bus, and enjoy a comfortable journey. Track your bus location in real-time through our app.

faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: Everything you need to know about booking tickets
faq.q1: How do I book a bus ticket?
faq.a1: You can easily book tickets online by selecting your cities, choosing your travel time, and confirming payment through our secure system.
faq.q2: Can I cancel or change my booking?
faq.a2: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before departure. Some restrictions may apply for peak times.
faq.q3: Are there discounts for students or seniors?
faq.a3: Yes, discounted fares are available for students and seniors with valid ID.
faq.a4: We accept debit/credit cards, mobile money, and other local payment options.
faq.q5: Do I need to print my ticket?
faq.a5: No, e-tickets are accepted. Just show your ticket on your phone when boarding.

aboutUsPage.connectingCommunities:
Connecting Rwanda's Communities
Through Reliable Bus Travel

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.heading: Leading Rwanda's Transport Revolution
vision.description: Founded in 2018, Aby Ticket envisions a Rwanda where seamless, sustainable bus travel connects every corner of the country. Aligned with Vision 2050, we aim to integrate cutting-edge technology like intelligent transportation systems and electric vehicles to make inter-city travel efficient, eco-friendly, and accessible for all Rwandans and visitors.

points.nationwide: Nationwide coverage serving over 50,000 passengers monthly
points.greenInitiatives: Pioneering green initiatives with electric bus pilots on Kigali-Musanze routes
points.digitalInnovation: Digital innovation for real-time tracking and contactless payments

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.heading: Safe, Affordable Journeys Across Rwanda
mission.description: Our mission is to provide reliable public bus services that bridge Rwanda's urban and rural areas. Regulated by RURA, we operate extensive routes from Kigali to destinations like Musanze for Volcano National Park visits, Rubavu on Lake Kivu, and Huye in the south, ensuring safe and punctual travel for commuters, tourists, and families.

safetyCompliance.title: Road Safety Compliance
safetyCompliance.description: Adhering to RTDA standards with axle load controls and regular safety audits.

extensiveNetwork.title: Extensive Network
extensiveNetwork.description: Covering all provinces with scheduled services to major towns and border points.

communityOriented.title: Community-Oriented
communityOriented.description: Affordable fares and partnerships with local cooperatives for inclusive transport.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.heading: Blending Tech with Rwandan Hospitality
approach.description: We combine Rwanda's renowned efficiency with modern innovations. Our fleet of over 40 buses features data-driven route planning inspired by Kigali's smart transport systems, ensuring optimal schedules while our staff provides warm, professional service rooted in Umuganda community spirit.

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: We adhere to Rwanda's strict road safety standards with regular vehicle inspections, professional drivers trained in defensive driving, and real-time GPS monitoring for all journeys.

punctualService.title: Punctual Service
punctualService.description: Our schedules are designed with Rwanda's traffic patterns in mind, ensuring on-time departures from key hubs like Nyabugogo Bus Station in Kigali.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: 24/7 support in Kinyarwanda, English, and French, with amenities like comfortable seating and Wi-Fi on select routes.

sustainableInnovation.title: Sustainable Innovation
sustainableInnovation.description: Pioneering electric bus trials in partnership with Rwanda's green transport initiatives, reducing emissions on popular routes.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose Aby Ticket?
whyChoose.description: As a proud Rwandan company, we're dedicated to elevating public transport standards with safety, innovation, and nationwide connectivity.

cta.heading: Ready to Explore Rwanda?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied travelers using Aby Ticket for safe journeys to Rwanda's stunning destinations, from Kigali's vibrant streets to the misty mountains of Musanze.

header.title: Complete Transportation
header.description: From online booking to offline USSD services, we provide flexible transport solutions for every need

onlineBooking.title: Online Ticket Booking
onlineBooking.subtitle: Kigali & Nationwide
onlineBooking.description: Book bus and car tickets online for routes within Kigali and across Rwanda. Secure payment via Mobile Money, cards, or bank transfer.

interCityCar.title: Inter-City Car Booking
interCityCar.subtitle: Outside Kigali
interCityCar.description: Comfortable car services connecting Kigali to major cities: Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, Rusizi, and all provinces.

carRental.title: Car Rental Services
carRental.subtitle: Daily & Long-term
carRental.description: Rent quality vehicles for business or leisure. Choose from sedans, SUVs, and vans with or without driver.

ussdBooking.title: USSD Booking
ussdBooking.subtitle: No Internet Required
ussdBooking.description: Book tickets without internet using USSD code *XXX#. Perfect for areas with limited connectivity or feature phones.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
realTimeTracking.subtitle: GPS Enabled
realTimeTracking.description: Track your vehicle location in real-time. Get accurate ETAs and share trip details with family for peace of mind.

corporateSolutions.title: Corporate Solutions
corporateSolutions.subtitle: For Businesses
corporateSolutions.description: Tailored transport solutions for organizations. Monthly packages, employee shuttles, and dedicated fleet management.

testimonialsSection.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Trusted by thousands of travelers across Rwanda

testimonials.name: Jean Claude Mugabo
testimonials.text: Excellent service! I use their inter-city booking every week for business trips to Musanze. Always on time and professional.

testimonials.name: Grace Uwase
testimonials.text: The USSD booking is a game-changer. I can book tickets even when I have no internet. Very convenient!

testimonials.name: Patrick Niyonzima
testimonials.text: We rent cars from them regularly for our tours. Great vehicles, competitive prices, and excellent customer service.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
hero.description: Find quick answers about booking, payments, tickets, and travel with our bus transport services across Rwanda.
hero.support: If you still need help, our support team is always ready to assist.

questions.question: How do I book a bus ticket online?

answer.content: Booking online is fast and simple!

steps: Go to our Online Booking page.
Select your departure city, destination, and travel date.
Choose your bus or seat type.
Pay using Mobile Money, card, or bank transfer.

answer.content: Your E-ticket will be sent instantly via SMS or email.

questions.question: Can I book a ticket without internet?

answer.content: Yes! Use our USSD service — no internet needed.
Just dial *XXX#, follow the prompts to choose your route and date, confirm payment, and you’ll receive your ticket by SMS.

items: Great for areas with limited internet

questions.question: Can I book a ticket for someone else?

answer.content: Yes, you can. Enter their name and phone number during booking, and the ticket will be sent directly to them via SMS.

questions.question: How do I know my booking is confirmed?

answer.content: Once payment is complete, you’ll receive an SMS or email confirmation with your ticket details and trip reference number.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?

answer.content: You can pay securely using:

questions.question: Is it safe to pay online?

answer.content: Yes! Our payment system is fully encrypted and secure. Your personal and payment details are always protected.

questions.question: Can I cancel or change my ticket?

answer.content: Yes, depending on the bus company and departure time.
Contact our support team with your booking reference, and they’ll guide you through the process.
Cancellation fees may apply if it’s close to departure time.

questions.question: What happens if I miss my bus?

answer.content: If you miss your trip, contact us as soon as possible.
We’ll help you reschedule if there’s space available (a small rescheduling fee may apply).

questions.question: Do I need to print my ticket?

answer.content: No printing needed! Just show your E-ticket or SMS confirmation when boarding.

questions.question: How early should I arrive before departure?

answer.content: We recommend arriving at least 20–30 minutes before departure to check in and secure your seat.

questions.question: Can I choose my seat when booking?

answer.content: Yes, on selected routes you can choose your seat online before payment.
If seat selection isn’t available, our agents will assign you one at the station.

questions.question: What happens if the bus is delayed?

answer.content: We’ll notify you by SMS or call if there’s any delay.
Our team works to minimize wait times and keep trips on schedule.

questions.question: How much luggage can I bring?

answer.content: Each passenger is allowed one standard bag (up to 20kg) plus a small carry-on.
Extra luggage may be charged depending on space availability.

questions.question: Are food and drinks allowed on the bus?

answer.content: Yes, light snacks and drinks are allowed — but please be considerate and keep the bus clean.
Absolutely! Our buses are modern, clean, and air-conditioned, with comfortable seats and professional drivers to make your journey pleasant.

questions.question: How can I contact customer support?

answer.content: You can reach us easily through:

items: Live Chat: Available on our website

answer.content: Hours: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM (Monday–Sunday)

questions.question: What should I do if I lose my ticket?

answer.content: Don’t worry — contact support with your name and phone number, and we’ll resend your ticket instantly.

questions.question: How can I give feedback or report an issue?

answer.content: We value your feedback!
Send an email to feedback@abyticket.rw or message us on WhatsApp to share your experience.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help you 7 days a week.

hero.title: How to Book Your Ticket with Ease
hero.description: Booking your next trip across Rwanda has never been simpler! We offer multiple convenient ways to book — whether you’re online, on your phone, or on the go.

steps.title: 1. Book Online
steps.subtitle: Fast, secure, and available 24/7
list: Select your departure city, destination, and travel date.
Choose your seat or vehicle type (bus or car).
Pay securely using Mobile Money, card, or bank transfer.
Receive your E-ticket instantly via SMS or email.
features: No need to print — show your e-ticket!

steps.title: 2. Book via USSD (No Internet Needed)
steps.subtitle: Perfect for areas with limited connectivity
list: Follow the menu to select your route and travel date.
Confirm your booking and pay with Mobile Money.
Get your ticket instantly via SMS.

steps.title: 3. Need a Private Ride?
list: Choose from comfortable sedans, SUVs, or vans.
Airport pickups and door-to-door options available.
Pay securely and track your vehicle in real time.

steps.title: For Companies & Groups
steps.description: Looking for reliable transport for your organization? We offer corporate transport solutions, including:

hero.title: Help & Support
hero.description: We’re here to make your travel smooth and stress-free. Find answers, contact our team, or get real-time help below.

faqs.question: How do I book a ticket online?

answer.content: You can book online anytime!

steps: Go to our Online Booking page.
Choose your route, date, and seat.
Pay using Mobile Money, bank, or card.
Receive your E-ticket instantly via SMS or email.

answer.content: Yes! Simply dial *XXX# and follow the steps to book via USSD.
You’ll get your ticket instantly after payment.
We accept:

faqs.question: Can I rent a car or book inter-city transport?

answer.content: Yes. We provide car rentals (daily or long-term) and inter-city car services connecting Kigali with all major cities in Rwanda — including Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, and Rusizi.

faqs.question: How do I track my vehicle?

answer.content: You can track your car or bus in real time using GPS.
Receive accurate arrival times, and share trip details with family for safety.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or change my booking?

answer.content: Yes, changes and cancellations are possible depending on your booking type.
Contact our support team with your booking reference, and we’ll assist you.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need help right now? Our friendly team is available to assist you every day.

cookieConsent.title: We value your privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver personalized advertisements relevant to you.
